Introduction
This topic contains information about the responsibilities of intake sites and regional offices (ROs) in handling pre-discharge claims, including
definition of intake site
responsibilities of BDD coordinators
paper document handling procedures specific to pre-discharge claims
initial actions upon receipt of a BDD claim
initial development actions in pre-discharge claims
circumstances requiring additional/alternative intake site action(s)
posttraumatic stress disorder (PTSD), including personal trauma and military sexual trauma (MST) development requirements
actions to take for claims filed
more than 180 days prior to discharge
, and
with no known date of discharge
intake site responsibilities to update VBMS
actions to take for BDD claims without substantially complete STRs
handling paper pre-discharge claims folders
initial actions upon receipt of an electronic pre-discharge claim
, and
handling late-flowing claim documents
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section B - Benefits Delivery at Discharge (BDD) and Initial Processing
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section B
